item.title: Fibonacci sequence and Pythagorean triples in the composition of functions for integer solutions from certain operator
item.description: arXiv:2405.21039v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The following article summarizes research where theorems and their respective demonstrations are postulated based on quadratic equations with special properties given by the Pythagorean triplets and the Fibonacci sequence given the second order of equations where integer solutions are found an environment in number theory and its applications to calculus.
item.dc:creator: Pablo Jos\'e Vega Esparza
